name: Utopia?
description:
#UtopiaGame

Story

You find yourself in a strange ship where rumors say its a cruise to a place everyone call Paradise. Its a place where all dreams will come true. It is year 2077 and the situation in the big city is desperate. With polution rises to dangerous levels. Everyone trying to find a way to escape and that is what the cruise offered. And Escape but To where? is unknown. Will you be able to find your way out and find all the mysteries this ship holds?

Objectives

Place the pipes right so the energy can reach its destination so the way can be open.

Controls

WASD to move around E to Interact with doors and chest and terminals etc R and Mouse Click to rotate and Place pipes P to Pause

An Adventure/Mystery Game Inspired by the "Connected" theme for #gamedevjongamejam4. Built in a little over 2 weeks.

#puzzle
